title: GM Ventures invests in startup building fast charge-capable battery tech - TechCrunch
content: GM Ventures invests in startup building fast charge-capable battery tech  TechCrunch
description: Soelect, a battery technology startup based in North Carolina, has closed an $11 million Series A round. It plans to use the fresh capital to scale its fast charge-capable anode technologies that might enable the next generation of batteries for electric vehicles. Alongside lead investor Lotte Chemâ€¦
